author: Karen J
title: Best Hotel Bar by Far!
text:
We love this place - and as a Londoner, its not too often you can say that about somewhere so central, in touristy Covent Garden. The location is amazing, the facilities are also lovely- classic, but also impeccably clean and well looked after. But what always sells this place for me- the people! You meet so many great characters from guests and the staff. I recommend stopping by just for drinks in the Bar if nothing else. It's such a welcoming place. The Italian bar manager really looks after you, and the whole team are incredibly attentive. There is so much choice, but I really recommend their blush rose with dry strawberries. It's definitely worth spending a bit more than your local pub to sit in such comfort, with such good humour and company. They are the ultimate experience of what amazing 'service with a smile' should be :)
